title: Dear Richard Madeley: 'My life is being ruined by anxiety and self-doubt'
text:
Dear Richard

I am a 30-something female. I have never been a very confident person but the older I get, the worse my insecurities seem to get. I miss out on opportunities because I think about all the things that could go wrong and end up talking myself out of things. There are so many things I would like to do in life. I even dream of taking an acting course, but fear and a lack of confidence are holding me back and I feel that life is passing me by.

Do you have any advice/suggestions as to how I can become a more confident and go-getting person?

Alison, Dorset
